xwikidoc.title: Mail Translations
xwikidoc.content: admin.email=E-post admin.email.description=Konfigurer parametere for sending av e-post og vis e-poststatuser. admin.emailgeneral=Avansert ### Missing: admin.emailgeneral.description=Configure advanced mail parameters, like mail address obfuscation. admin.emailsend=E-post sending admin.emailsend.description=Konfigurer e-post-sendeparametere. admin.emailstatus=E-postsendingsstatus admin.emailstatus.description=Vis statusene til sendte e-post og send p책 nytt e-postmeldinger som har feilet. ### Missing: admin.emailstatus.hint=If you can't find the status of a mail then it may be because the property which sent the mail did not specify that mail status should persist. ### Missing: Mail.GeneralMailConfigClass_obfuscate=Obfuscate Email Addresses ### Missing: Mail.GeneralMailConfigClass_obfuscate.hint=This only affects the email addresses stored in object properties of type Email, as long as the default custom displayer for the Email property type is not overwritten. Example: a...@domain.org ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_from=Email address to send from Mail.SendMailConfigClass_from.hint=Standard e-postadressen som brukt til 책 sende varslingsmeldinger ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_bcc=BCC email addresses ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_bcc.hint=A default comma-separated list of BCC email addresses to use when sending mail Mail.SendMailConfigClass_host=E-postserver ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_host.hint=The SMTP server to send to. Defaults to "localhost" ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_port=Email Server Port ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_port.hint=The port of the SMTP server to use. Defaults to 25 ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_username=Email Server Username ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_username.hint=The username to connect to the SMTP server, only when authentication is required ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_password=Email Server Password ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_password.hint=The password to connect to the SMTP server, only when authentication is required Mail.SendMailConfigClass_properties=Ytterligere egenskaper ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_properties.hint=The list of additional JavaMail properties to use (e.g. "mail.smtp.starttls.enable=true" for TLS) ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_sendWaitTime=Send Wait Time ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_sendWaitTime.hint=The delay between each mail being sent, in milliseconds (defaults to 8 seconds) ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_discardSuccessStatuses=Discard Success Statuses? ### Missing: Mail.SendMailConfigClass_discardSuccessStatuses.hint=No matter whether mail statuses are kept or not for mail that has been sent successfully (defaults to true) Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.date=Dato ### Missing: Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.batchId=Batch ID Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.type=Type Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.recipients=Mottakere Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.state=Status Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.wiki=Wiki Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.error=Feil Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.actions=Handlinger Mail.SendMailStatus_livetable.resend=Send p책 nytt mailSender.admin.resendSuccess=Meldingen er sendt p책 nytt ### Missing: mailSender.admin.resendFailure=Failed to resend. Click for more details.
